text: Maroon 5 is slated to perform the 2019 Super Bowl halftime show. ( Photo : Chris Pizzello / Invision / AP ) Maroon 5, fronted by Adam Levine, is slated to perform the 2019 Super Bowl halftime show. A report from ` ` Variety'' announced the headlining pick for Super Bowl LIII. The pop rock act follows Justin Timberlake's 2018 Super Bowl halftime performance. The Feb. 3 game will mark the Super Bowl's first return to Atlanta in 19 years. That milestone has some criticizing the NFL for going with the Los Angeles - based Maroon 5 instead of highlighting the city's musical talent during the premier match.
